area.key: Optional. The path to the Razor view that renders the subject line. For example, "~\Views\Emails\Contact Us (Subject).cshtml" (without quotes).
Required. The path to the Razor view that renders the HTML version of the email message. For example, "~\Views\Emails\Contact Us (HTML).cshtml" (without quotes).
Optional. The path to the Razor view that renders the text version of the email message. For example, "~\Views\Emails\Contact Us (Text).cshtml" (without quotes).
